name: CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.functorHomEquiv_symm_apply_app_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F G H : CategoryTheory.Functor C (Type (max w v u))
a✝¹ : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj F G) H
X : C
a : G.obj X
Y : C
f : (Opposite.unop (CategoryTheory.coyoneda.rightOp.obj X)).obj Y
a✝ : F.obj Y
⊢ Eq ((((CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.functorHomEquiv F G H).symm a✝¹).app X a).app Y f a✝) (a✝¹.app Y { fst := a✝, snd := G.map f a })
decl:
/-- When `F G H : C ⥤ Type max w v u`, we have `(G ⟶ F.functorHom H) ≃ (F ⊗ G ⟶ H)`. -/
@[simps!]
def functorHomEquiv (G H : C ⥤ Type max w v u) : (G ⟶ F.functorHom H) ≃ (F ⊗ G ⟶ H) :=
  (Functor.functorHomEquiv F H G).trans (homObjEquiv F H G)

name: CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.functorHomEquiv_apply_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F G H : CategoryTheory.Functor C (Type (max w v u))
a✝ : Quiver.Hom G (F.functorHom H)
X : C
x✝ : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj F G).obj X
⊢ Eq (((CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.functorHomEquiv F G H) a✝).app X x✝) (CategoryTheory.Functor.homObjEquiv.match_1 F G X (fun x => H.obj X) x✝ fun x y => (a✝.app X y).app X (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id X) x)
decl:
/-- When `F G H : C ⥤ Type max w v u`, we have `(G ⟶ F.functorHom H) ≃ (F ⊗ G ⟶ H)`. -/
@[simps!]
def functorHomEquiv (G H : C ⥤ Type max w v u) : (G ⟶ F.functorHom H) ≃ (F ⊗ G ⟶ H) :=
  (Functor.functorHomEquiv F H G).trans (homObjEquiv F H G)

name: CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj_map_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F G H : CategoryTheory.Functor C (Type (max w v u))
f : Quiver.Hom G H
c : C
a : (F.functorHom G).obj c
d : C
b : (Opposite.unop (CategoryTheory.coyoneda.rightOp.obj c)).obj d
a✝ : F.obj d
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj_map f c a).app d b a✝) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (a.app d b) (f.app d) a✝)
decl:
/-- Given a morphism `f : G ⟶ H`, an object `c : C`, and an element of `(F.functorHom G).obj c`,
construct an element of `(F.functorHom H).obj c`. -/
@[simps]
def rightAdj_map {F G H : C ⥤ Type max w v u} (f : G ⟶ H) (c : C) (a : (F.functorHom G).obj c) :
    (F.functorHom H).obj c where
  app d b := a.app d b ≫ f.app d
  naturality g h := by
    have := a.naturality g h
    change (F.map g ≫ a.app _ (h ≫ g)) ≫ _ = _
    aesop

name: CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj_obj_map_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor C (Type (max w v u))
X✝ Y✝ : C
f : Quiver.Hom X✝ Y✝
a✝¹ : (F.homObjFunctor G).obj (CategoryTheory.coyoneda.rightOp.obj X✝)
X : C
a : (Opposite.unop (CategoryTheory.coyoneda.rightOp.obj Y✝)).obj X
a✝ : F.obj X
⊢ Eq ((((CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj F).obj G).map f a✝¹).app X a a✝) (a✝¹.app X (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f a) a✝)
decl:
/-- A right adjoint of `tensorLeft F`. -/
@[simps!]
def rightAdj : (C ⥤ Type max w v u) ⥤ C ⥤ Type max w v u where
  obj G := F.functorHom G
  map f := { app := rightAdj_map f }

name: CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj_obj_obj
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor C (Type (max w v u))
X : C
⊢ Eq (((CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj F).obj G).obj X) (F.HomObj G (CategoryTheory.coyoneda.obj { unop := X }))
decl:
/-- A right adjoint of `tensorLeft F`. -/
@[simps!]
def rightAdj : (C ⥤ Type max w v u) ⥤ C ⥤ Type max w v u where
  obj G := F.functorHom G
  map f := { app := rightAdj_map f }

name: CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj_map_app_app
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
F X✝ Y✝ : CategoryTheory.Functor C (Type (max w v u))
f : Quiver.Hom X✝ Y✝
c : C
a : (F.functorHom X✝).obj c
d : C
b : (Opposite.unop (CategoryTheory.coyoneda.rightOp.obj c)).obj d
a✝ : F.obj d
⊢ Eq ((((CategoryTheory.FunctorToTypes.rightAdj F).map f).app c a).app d b a✝) (f.app d (a.app d b a✝))
decl:
/-- A right adjoint of `tensorLeft F`. -/
@[simps!]
def rightAdj : (C ⥤ Type max w v u) ⥤ C ⥤ Type max w v u where
  obj G := F.functorHom G
  map f := { app := rightAdj_map f }
